locations.Jabu Jabus Belly Entryway Octorok Left:
has_soul(Octorok) and
                (at('Jabu Jabus Belly Main', True) or can_use(Deku_Shield) or
                   (is_adult and (Magic_Meter or Hylian_Shield)))
locations.Jabu Jabus Belly Entryway Octorok Right:
has_soul(Octorok) and
                (at('Jabu Jabus Belly Main', True) or can_use(Deku_Shield) or

locations.Jabu Jabus Belly Deku Scrub:
can_stun_deku and
                (can_dive or is_child or logic_jabu_alcove_jump_dive or can_use(Iron_Boots))

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Before Boss: (logic_jabu_boss_hover and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or jabu_shortcuts or Jabu_Jabus_Belly_Floor_Lowered

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Past Big Octo

savewarp: Zoras Fountain -> Jabu Jabus Belly Beginning
